description:
When you’re looking to complete your fit, the right shoes are clutch. With their retro silhouette and modern blocky sole, the 327s manage to be both casual and bold, giving them incredible seasonal and styling versatility.

  • Suede, nylon and mesh uppers look great, wear well and let your feet breathe
  • Classic wedge profile pays respect to classic runners from the ‘70s
  • Supportive EVA midsole provides all day comfort
  • Heavily lugged outsole offers solid traction and style
name: New Balance 327 Shoes - Unisex
